title: Blue Sky Ideas in Artificial Intelligence Education from the EAAI 2017 New and Future AI Educator Program
abstract: The 7th Symposium on Educational Advances in Artificial Intelligence (EAAI'17, co-chaired by Sven Koenig and Eric Eaton) launched the EAAI New and Future AI Educator Program to support the training of early-career university faculty, secondary school faculty, and future educators (PhD candidates or postdocs who intend a career in academia). As part of the program, awardees were asked to address one of the following "blue sky" questions:
histories: Working paper in the 7th Symposium on Educational Advances in Artificial Intelligence (EAAI-17)
COMMENTS: Working paper in the 7th Symposium on Educational Advances in Artificial Intelligence (EAAI-17)
